name: 林彥良
objective: This course is designed to improve your English in reading, speaking, listening, and writing. There will be frequent discussions and chances for you to speak up and express yourselves. Please do not be afraid to take part in group discussion—this is a pressure-free and friendly learning environment. All students are encouraged to reach out to your classmates, make friends with them, and learn together—in English!
schedule:
Week 1　　Course Introduction
Week 2　　U1L1 Make generalizations 
Week 3　　U1L2 Write an informal Email/Break
Week 4　　U1L3 Retell a simple narrative
Week 5　　U2L1 Giving opinions and agree/disagree/Break
Week 6　　U2L2 Deal with problems
Week 7　　U2L3 Describe an important event
Week 8　　In-class Midterm
Week 9　　English Proficiency Exam 
Week 10　　U3L1 Write a letter of complaint / U3L2 Compare cities
Week 11　　U3L3 Make a formal phone call
Week 12　　U4L1 Make small talk / U4L2 Make and respond to invitations
Week 13　　U4L3 Write a short classified ad
Week 14　　U5L1 Suggest and respond to ideas
Week 15　　U5L2 Describe a movie or book
Week 16　　U5L3 Recommend a restaurant 
Week 17　　In-class Final Exam
Week 18　　English Proficiency Exam
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam 15%
Final Exam 15% 
English Proficiency Exams 15% + 15%
Group Presentation 15%
In-class Quizzes 15%
Class Attendance & Participation: 10% 
(Three unexcused absences from class will result in automatic failure of the course.)
